availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: David H. Johnson (Franklin County, KY, carpenter)

body.p: Franklin County, Kentucky, carpenter. Kentucky native. Son of David J. Johnson and Susan Johnson. Married to Martha Jane Baugh Johnson in Anderson County, Kentucky, in October 1854. Father of Susan M. Johnson, Martha H. Johnson, and Annie E. Johnson. Resident of Louisville in 1850. Carpenter in Franklin County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville District 1, p. 20A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, District 2, p. 320.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Daviess County, Knottsville, p. 158A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Anderson County Marriages, Film 001550673, p. 203.
